blog.name: mrdaps
blog.title: Mr. DAPs
blog.description:
Hi there!

I am Mr. DAPs, that guy with the hat that walks around Disneyland. I will mainly be posting some pictures that I have taken that I particularly like here but will occasionally post some other things.

You can read some of my other posts at any or all of the links below:

Blog: mrdaps.com
Website: dapsmagic.com
Twitter: twitter.com/mrdaps
Facebook: facebook.com/misterdaps

Please feel free to add me on any or all of the above links. I look forward to chatting with you and seeing you in the park!

Make it a GREAT day!

-Mr. DAPs

summary: A Week of Movie Magic - DISNEY Reporter
title: A Week of Movie Magic - DISNEY Reporter
body:
A Week of Movie Magic – DISNEY Reporter

Welcome to another weekly edition of the DISNEY Reporter. This week, there is a lot of movie news in the headlines. New trailers were released for Avengers: Endgame and also Aladdin. Also in Aladdin news, Iago has found his voice thanks to Alan Tudyk. Disney has rehired James Gunn as the director for Guardians of the Galaxy 3. Captain Marvelhas had a very successful opening week and also has an…

summary: Avengers: Endgame, where have all the barbers gone?
title: Avengers: Endgame, where have all the barbers gone?
excerpt: The latest Avengers: Endgame trailer dropped this morning and we have a lot of questions. Questions that start with: Hawkeye, why? Last time, we ended up mourning Cap’s beard. This time… I’m mourning what is clearly a complete decimation of the barber and hair care industry. I know that they are all very busy and important, but...
description: Come home, Clint, you’re drunk and so’s your barber.

summary:
Are you worried about Endgame?
Did the new trailer leave you emotionally compromised?
If you answered yes to either of these...
body:
Are you worried about Endgame?

Did the new trailer leave you emotionally compromised?

If you answered yes to either of these questions, I’d like to invite you to join the Engame Support Group discord. If you want to join, just click the link in my description. Hope to see you and we can all freak out together!

summary: [Avengers: Endgame] Thanos contro i Vendicatori nelle cover di Empire Magazine
title: [Avengers: Endgame] Thanos contro i Vendicatori nelle cover di Empire Magazine
body:
[Avengers: Endgame] Thanos contro i Vendicatori nelle cover di Empire Magazine

La rivista Empire Magazine ha da poco svelato le nuove copertine relative al prossimo numero di maggio, ovviamente dedicate ad Avengers: Endgame.

Per il numero in questione, Empire ha scelto di creare tre diverse versioni: una completamente dedicata a Thanos, una seconda con i 6 Vendicatori originali, ed una terza – destinata agli abbonati – ancora col Titano Pazzo al centro dell’attenzione.

View On WordPress

blog.description: HIATUS/INACTIVE. a salty chompy mofo bitch. Marvel & sometimes other stuff | Spoilers | Hate-free (but there will be criticism) | Meta, gifs, art, everything goes. There will be multishipping. Header by @anthonyed

tags: like i keep seeing this and just... why is this a thing
summary: Okay, so here’s a comprehensive list of all the reasons why the outrage over one (1) scene of Carol in the Endgame trailer is...
body:
Okay, so here’s a comprehensive list of all the reasons why the outrage over one (1) scene of Carol in the Endgame trailer is blown WAY out of proportion. 

1) Endgame was filmed first, so it’s not like they are ignoring her determined style in Captain Marvel–because Captain Marvel didn’t exist yet. 

2) Carol didn’t appear to be wearing “heavy makeup” (aka noticeable makeup) in the Captain Marvel post-credits scene (where she’s still in uniform). This is important because this scene is from Endgame–shot by the Russos with their production crew (and makeup department). 

See? Nude lipstick. Minimal eye-shadow and eyeliner. Her hair is even frazzled. Same exact crew who worked on the apparently uber-feminine male-gazey Compound scene from the trailer. Huh. It’s almost like Carol can change looks within the same film. 

3) The argument “This isn’t about Carol’s ‘choice’ because Carol has no choice!” like… the same exact thing could be said about her look in Captain Marvel. I do understand criticisms of how the male gaze influences the depiction of female characters (from their wardrobe like completely ridiculous heels, boob windows, unnecessary ass shots, etc.), but ultimately a fictional character is the product of many hands–and this could be said for any film (male or female-directed). 

4) Carol was wearing makeup the whole time in Captain Marvel. If people believe she wasn’t… I have a brand new speed boat I can sell them. Her makeup in the film was just “nude” or “natural”, but it was still a heavy amount–especially around the eyes. 

That’s heavy eyeliner, my friends. (And her hair is definitely styled there with a curling iron.)

5) In the controversial “makeup” scene from the trailer, Carol is dressed down indoors. She’s not in the middle of a fight or anything. She even appears to be wearing one of Natasha’s tops. Given Carol doesn’t live on Earth, it’s very possible that she borrowed what Nat had lying around–including Nat’s makeup.

6) It’s been 20+ years since Captain Marvel. It’s always possible Carol changed her style up. 

7) Speaking of which, most of Carol’s look in Captain Marvel was a product of circumstance. She stole clothes off a mannequin to “fit in” with the Earth culture (she didn’t have her memories yet). She also never had time to clean up, relax, or anything of the sort.  

8) Do you really think Brie wouldn’t have said something if she was uncomfortable with Carol’s look? 

9) Makeup is usually not determined by the directors. There’s a whole department for that–and even stylists are consulted. Most of these jobs are held by women. 

I get feeling defensive and protective, but we’ve only seen one quick scene so far. Maybe judgment should be held until the film is released, eh?

1) Endgame was filmed first, so it’s not like they are ignoring her determined style in Captain Marvel–because Captain Marvel didn’t exist yet.

I do understand criticisms of how the male gaze influences the depiction of female characters (from their wardrobe like completely ridiculous heels, boob windows, unnecessary ass shots, etc.), but ultimately a fictional character is the product of many hands–and this could be said for any film (male or female-directed). 

4) Carol was wearing makeup the whole time in Captain Marvel. If people believe she wasn’t… I have a brand new speed boat I can sell them. Her makeup in the film was just “nude” or “natural”, but it was still a heavy amount–especially around the eyes.

summary: Ok but is anyone noticing Nat is crying here? Like she is looking at Clint who is angry, grieving and in pain as he is in some...
body:
Ok but is anyone noticing Nat is crying here?

Like she is looking at Clint who is angry, grieving and in pain as he is in some random part of the world killing to avenge his children's’ and wifes’ death.

Do you realize that Nat helped Clint raise his kids when he was probably having bad days or just needed time with his wife? She became close and Natasha loves kids. 

She was also close to Clint’s wife. That was her family. 

She just found out that they died too. 

THEY ARE BOTH GRIEVING. UGH I HATE THIS

reblog.comment:
Ok but is anyone noticing Nat is crying here?

Like she is looking at Clint who is angry, grieving and in pain as he is in some random part of the world killing to avenge his children's’ and wifes’ death.

Do you realize that Nat helped Clint raise his kids when he was probably having bad days or just needed time with his wife? She became close and Natasha loves kids. 

She was also close to Clint’s wife. That was her family. 

She just found out that they died too. 

THEY ARE BOTH GRIEVING. UGH I HATE THIS

blog.name: dreamdragon48
blog.title: Poetic Wanderlust
blog.description: I reblog a lot so check my 'mygifs' tag for my gif sets. Feel free to ask questions or leave comments! Also, please do not repost my gif sets! Reblog is better! This blog is not Endgame friendly, or more specifically not Steve's ending friendly.

summary:
The new Empire magazine releasing March 21 in England and the US probably late April!
I want this magazine so badly. 
You can...
body:
The new Empire magazine releasing March 21 in England and the US probably late April!

I want this magazine so badly.

You can pre-order it now if you live in the UK but not the US.

Is there anyone in the UK willing to find it for me next week and send it to me?

I’ll pay of course for the magazine and shipping. Or if there’s something in the US you want, I can find it for you and send it to you as a trade.

Please DM and let me know.
